body.p:
Harrodsburgh Ky
4th June 1861
Gov. Magoffin S. Gill Dr Peyton Geo. L. Woods & Genl Dudley
Com of Ky for Destributing Arms
Gent

Referring you to accompanying Certificate of Presiding Judge showing that We Were organized under recent act of Asembly I make application for 100 stand of arms and &c & would like to have the Minnis rifle if on hand.
Please give my application a favourable consideration
Please let me be informed of your decesion

Very Respy
J. W. Cardwell
Capt. home Guard
Harrodsburg
Ky
My Company will soon reach 100 men
